pages.text:
Markers are used to create a path for the ants to follow.
See how this is done in $(l:antsportation:mechanics/setup_item_transport)setup item transport.$()

Chunk Loading Markers are a type of Markers which chunk loads the chunk it is placed it, allowing ants to properly go through that chunk when the player is not nearby.
Enabled: $(scfg/ants.chunkloadingMarkers)
